title: DeriveVirtualAccountAddressRequest
description: Derives the virtual account component address given a public key and a network id.

network_id.description: An unsigned 8 bit integer serialized as a string which represents the ID of the network that the address will be used on. The primary use of this is for any Bech32m encoding or decoding of addresses

public_key.description: The public key to derive the virtual account address for

PublicKey.description: A discriminated union of the possible public keys used by Scrypto and the Radix Engine.

oneOf.description: A byte array of 33 bytes which are serialized as a 66 character long hex-encoded string representing a public key from the ECDSA Secp256k1 elliptic curve.
A byte array of 32 bytes which are serialized as a 64 character long hex-encoded string representing a public key from the EDDSA Ed25519 edwards curve.
